cast.overview: Slowed by age and failing eyesight, crack baseball scout Gus Lobel takes his grown daughter along as he checks out the final prospect of his career. Along the way, the two renew their bond, and she catches the eye of a young player-turned-scout.
cast.title: Trouble with the Curve

details.biography: Joseph Davis Massingill is a stage and screen actor, and aspiring playwright. He earned his BFA in Theatre Arts, from Valdosta State University. His show, a night of theatre including two original plays (Passing Proper, Passion and Precision) received an award from stagescenela.com, for Outstanding Ensemble (Intimate Theatre).
details.name: Joe Massingill
